Overview & Set-up

Project Description

The Grad Cafe database and analytics project is a full code package for capturing and analyzing aggregate data from Grad Cafe.

Running the App

To run the app from your terminal, run: python flask_app.py in the source directory.

Running Tests

To run the entire suite of tests, run: pytest module_4 within the active directory.

For more information on testing, please visit Testing Guide.
